message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product, it's truly one of a kind. I'm thinking of a price in the $20,000 range, but open to discussing what works for you. What are your initial thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I have a budget constraint
Bob, I appreciate you making an offer and understanding your budget constraints.  However, $12,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line.  Could you meet me somewhere in the middle, say around $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000
